game.name: Stickman Ninja Dash
game.description:
Can you imagine stickman playing the role of an agile ninja? Join Stickman Ninja Dash and be prepared to learn how to become a master of ninjutsu. Your job is going to be tougher than you thought of. We can understand that it is not going to be easy to defeat a horde of evil stickmen. Get your favorite weapon Dash in your hand and get ready to stop a huge team of enemies from invading your home. You will lose your game if an enemy reaches your home. 
Touch the screen and try to perform some kick-ass moves to make your win in the end in this brand action game. You will also get a chance to grab some amazing outfits with the help of your unique skills. Put your best to protect your city against the invaders. As one of the most popular and dangerous warriors, you are also blessed with a great amount of deadly martial arts skills and powerful weapons. Use his swift moves and sharp reflexes to stand strong against your enemies. 
All the residents of the city trust on your skills. So, step out as a real hero and stop the march of the attackers. Play wisely, grab some points and do not forget to unsheathe your weapons. Attackers will keep coming to you in different waves. Click the screen and to move forward and get ready to kill all your enemies in a single shot. You will see the coins on the screen when you defeat your enemies. Buy 6 different characters from the in-game shop through the coins you grab during your gameplay in this cool html5 fighting game. Good luck to try more free nina games online here, no downloads required.
